member.name: BANDINFOSFB
member.summary: Contains information about a folder band. This structure is used with the and methods.

summary.para: A mask that indicates which members of this BANDINFOSFB structure are valid. One or more of the following values.
The dwStateMask member is valid.
The crBkgnd member is valid.
The wViewMode member is valid.
The psf member is valid.
The pidl member is valid.
The crBtnLt and crBtnDk members are valid.
A mask that indicates which of the dwState bits are valid to be set or queried. One or more of the following values.
None of the dwState bits.
Displays the object with a debossed state, which is with a sunken appearance.
Allow renaming and a context menu.
Do not show text.
Deprecated.
Deprecated.
Maximize when opened.
The band does not sort by name.
The band reports the minimum size of its button when queried.

member.name: BANDINFOSFB.dwState
member.summary: State bits. One of the values listed for dwStateMask.

member.name: BANDINFOSFB.crBkgnd
member.summary: A COLORREF that contains the background color of the band.

member.name: BANDINFOSFB.crBtnLt
member.summary: COLORREF that contains the light button color.

member.name: BANDINFOSFB.crBtnDk
member.summary: COLORREF that contains the dark button color.

summary.para: View mode of the band. One of the following values.
Use small icons on the folder band.
Use large icons on the folder band.

para.b: Not supported under Windows Vista or later. Not supported under Internet Explorer version 7 or later.
